Tucson
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
Settings
Facebook Login Map App Info Map 625462257657619 // if your App ID is 1234567, you should use fb1234567 fb625462257657619
Send Location Error during the location send Location sent My position This is my current position Historical positions Attention, you must be logged in to view the locations on the map Tucson is an app that is based on the geolocation of your Hyundai Tucson.

Available functions:
Facebook Login: Login with your facebook account.
Map: It allows you to display on all Hyundai Tucson area who have sent their position through the App. Show only the last position sent by each user.
Historical positions: It allows you to view the area all the positions that you have sent so far. Displays only the position sent to you.
Settings: It lets you choose some settings such as the maximum number of positions to be displayed in the historic or whether or not to send even the email address associated with your Facebook account
Info: About of application functionality. Send your associated email address to facebook account when you send your location Maximum number of visible positions in the feature "Historical positions" No internet connection
